This document focuses importantly on the fact that if a particular group does not have its health outcomes monitored, it cannot get the resources needed to improve those outcomes. Powerful case for racial/ethnic/etc reporting of COVID outcomes.

A beautiful if heart-wrenching column by Rachel Kennedy @Princeton on why we must focus now -- not only later -- on disparities in COVID impact by race and other factors. Including a tribute to her mother on anniversary of her death. https://t.co/3nqCEWKLCu
